text: Jihohin Najeriya bakwai da ke kan gaba a samun kudin shiga.
label: hausa

text: Da kuɗaɗen ne jihohin ke gudanar da ayyuka da biyan albashi da kuma tafiyar da gwamnati.
label: hausa

text: Don haka idan babu wannan kuɗi jihohin ƙasar da dama ba za su iya gudanar da kansu ba.
label: hausa

text: To sai dai akwai jihohin da ke ƙoƙorin samar wa kansu hanyoyin dogaro da kai ta hanyar inganta karɓar haraji da inganta kasuwanci domin dogaro da kansu.
label: hausa

text: Sai dai cibiyar ta BudgetIT ba ta sanya jihar Rivers - mai ɗimbin arzikin man fetur - cikin lissafin ba, saboda dokar-ta-ɓacin da aka sanya wa jihar a farkon shekarar nan, lamarin da ya sa ta kasa wallafa abin da samu a 2024.
label: hausa

text: Legas ta yi gagarumin yunƙuri wajen haɓa wa kanta kuɗin shiga.
label: hausa

text: Kuma bayanai sun ce kashi 73 cikin 100 na wannan kudi jihar - wadda ke kudu maso yammacin ƙasar ta same su ne daga harajin da take karɓa.
label: hausa

text: Jihar Enugu da ke yankin kudu maso gabashin Najeriya na daga cikin jihohin da ke kan gaba wajen samun kuɗin shiga, a cewar BudgetIT.
label: hausa

text: Ana ganin jihar za ta iya riƙe kanta da abin da take samu ko da ba ta samun kason tarayya ba.
label: hausa

text: Jihar ta samu gagarumin ci gaba na kuɗin shigar da take samu a cikin gida.
label: hausa

text: Arzikin da jihar ta samu a cikin gida a 2024 ya kai naira biliyan 180.50, ciki har da naira biliya 26.68 da ta samu ta hanyar biyan haraji.
label: hausa

text: Hukumar tattara haraji ta jihar ta Kano, KIRS ta kuma sha alwashin tattara harajin cikin gida da ya kai naira biliyan 180 a 2026.
label: hausa

text: Jihar Kwara - wadda ke tsakiyar Najeriya na daga cikin jihohin ƙasar da ake ganin karansu ya kai tseko ta fuskar tara kuɗin shiga a cikin gida.
label: hausa

text: A cewar BudgetIT, jihar ta samu naira biliyan 107.83 a 2024, daga cikin waɗannan naira biliyan 34.83 ta samu ne daga haraji.
label: hausa

text: Tchiroma ya yi buƙaci ƴan Kamaru su zauna a gida don nuna turjiya ga sakamakon zaɓe.

text: Sai dai ya ƙara da cewa an sace mutane biyu daga cikin iyalansa da kuma mai musu girki a garinsa na Garoua.

text: Kiran nasa na zuwa ne bayan rikice-rikicen da suka ɓarke bayan zaɓe, wanda ya yi sanadin mutuwar da raunata mutane da dama, tare da damƙe wasu masu zanga-zanga.
label: hausa

text: A farkon makon nan, gwamnatin ƙasar ta ce Tchiroma Bakary zai fuskanci shari’a bisa iƙrarin nasara da kuma shirya zanga-zanga, wanda ta bayyana a matsayin tayar da fitina.

text: Addadin waɗandu suka mutu sanadin guguwar Melissa a Jamaica sun ƙaru.

text: Har yanzu yawancin sassan tsibirin ba su da wutar lantarki, yayin da mazauna ke ƙoƙarin ceto kadarorinsu daga ambaliyar ruwa da laka.

text: Mutane da dama suna cikin halin matsanancin bukatar taimako.

text: Sai dai yanzu kayan agaji sun fara shiga cikin kasar da sauri, bayan da filin jirgin saman babban birnin Kingston ya dawo aiki yadda ya kamata.

text: Amma kananan filayen jiragen sama na yankuna, musamman wadanda ke kusa da wuraren da ake bukatar taimako sosai, har yanzu ba sa aiki gaba ɗaya.

text: Kayan agaji sun fara isa Jamaica bayan ɓarnar guguwar Melissa.

text: Gwamnatin Jamaica na ci gaba da kokarin dawo da wutar lantarki a yankuna da dama, yayin da ambaliyar ruwa ta ci gaba da hana zirga-zirga a wasu sassan yammacin kasar.

text: Rahotanni sun nuna cewa gidaje da dama sun rushe yayin ruwan sama mai karfi, kuma rundunar sojin Jamaica na gudanar da aikin kwashe tarkacen gini da suka toshe hanyoyin shiga wasu yankuna da bala’in ya shafa.

text: Barcelona na bibiyar Victor Osimhen, ƙungiyoyin Turai na rubibin Etta Eyong.

text: Ɗan wasan bayan Barcelona Eric Garcia ya amince da sabuwar kwangila da ƙungiyar duk da cewa akwai ƙungiyoyi irin Chelsea da Tottenham da ke zawarcin ɗan wasan Sifaniyan mai shekara 24.

text: Tottenham na fatan ɗauko ɗan wasan gaban Juventus da Canada, Jonathan David a watan Janairu, yayin da Bayern Munich ke bibiyar ɗan wasan mai shekara 25.

text: Ba mu tilastawa kowa shiga jam'iyyarmu — Martanin APC ga Muftwang.

text: Jam'iyyar APC mai mulki a Najeriya ta yi martani ga gwamnan jihar Filato, Caleb Mutfwang, game da zargin da ya yi mata na amfani da ƙarfi wajen tursasa masa komawa cikinta.

text: A baya-baya nan ne aka jiyo gwamnan na PDP na cewa APC na bin wannan hanya wajen jan ra'ayin sa kamar yadda ta yi wa wasu gwamnoni da aka ga sun koma jam'iyyar.

text: Hanyoyin da China ke yi wa Birtaniya leƙen asiri.
label: hausa

text: Tambaya ce da gwamnatoci suka dinga fama wajen neman amsarata: wace irin barazana China ke yi wa Birtaniya?
label: hausa

text: Mutanen sun musanta aikata wani laifi - amma bayan yin watsi da zargin da ake yi musu a watan da ya gabata, sai kuma hakan ya jawo cecekuce irin na siyasa.
label: hausa

text: Duk waɗannan rikita-rikita na ƙara jawo ayoyin tambayoyi ne game da girman barazanar da Birtaniya ke fuskanta daga China.
label: hausa

text: A wani gefen, akwai masu yi wa China aikin leƙen asiri da ke ɓatar da kama a matsayin jami'an difilomasiyya, kuma suke ɗaukar mutane aikin tura musu bayanan sirri.
label: hausa

text: Babbar matsalar ita ce barazanar da China ke yi wa tsaron Birtaniya ta zarce irin leƙen asirin da aka saba da shi.
label: hausa

text: Wani shaida daga ofishin mai shigar da ƙara kan lamarin Cash da Berry da aka jingine ya nuna cewa.
label: hausa

text: Duk lokacin da aka kama wata ƙasa da irin wannan laifi, akan samu rashin jituwa amma kowa ya san abu ne da aka saba.
label: hausa

text: Amma ayyukan ya sha bamban da irin wannan hanya, abin da ke jefa wa mahukuntan Birtaniya fargaba.
label: hausa

text: Inda lamarin ya ƙara rikicewa shi ne, wasu da dama na ganin ya kamata Birtaniya ta tattauna da China.
label: hausa

text: Ƙarfin tattalin arzikin China, misali, zai bai wa Birtaniya damarmaki wajen haɓaka nata.
label: hausa

text: Ministar Kuɗi ta Birtaniya Rachel Reeves ta ce 'ɗaukar matakin ƙin tattaunawa da China bai kamata ba'.
label: hausa

text: Rahotonni sun ce sabuwar gwamnatin 'yan Labour na neman kyautata alaƙa da China.
label: hausa

text: Sai dai yin nasarar hakan da kuma iya zama da kasadar da ke cikin yin hakan matsala ce da ta sha kan gwamnatoci da dama.
label: hausa

text: A Birtaniya, fargabar da ake da ita game da tasirin China a siyasa na ƙaruwa.
label: hausa

text: Irin girman sashen tattara bayanan sirri na China, wanda wasu ke ƙiyasin ya kai mutum rabin miliyan idan aka lissafa da ma'aikata da na ƙasashe waje, na nufin za ta iya gudanar da wasu ayyuka da yawa fiye da sauran ƙasashe.
label: hausa

text: A China, abin da aka fi sakawa a gaba shi ne yin tasiri kan muhawara irin ta siyasa.

text: da kama masu adawa da gwamnati, da tattara byaanai masu yawna gaske.

text: da kuma tabbatar da cewa gwamnatin jam'iyyar kwamunisanci ta ci gaba da mulki.
